# isDirectory

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the resource is a directory.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDirectory: Bool? { get }
```

## Directory values

- **directoryEntryCount**: The count of file system objects in the directory.

items.description: The count of file system objects in the directory.
items.name: directoryEntryCount
